## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f0a170170a102f43fd03d3b08bbcb53a572a5f48cde13250b3059ff3b332404a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'tautoak4-hello-world' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
